example.eg: Christina's backpack has a lot of colorful badges.
example.egtrans: 克里斯蒂娜的背包上有很多五颜六色的徽章。

example.eg: The badge on this vest represents an outstanding achievement in charitable activities.
example.egtrans: 这件背心上的徽章代表了慈善活动的杰出成就。

example.eg: That company's logo is a badge of quality.
example.egtrans: 那家公司的商标就是质量的象征。

example.eg: The Boy Scout troop earned three badges on their camping trip last weekend.
example.egtrans: 上个周末童子军在野营旅行中获得了三枚奖章。

dsense.name: badge of honor (US), badge of honour (UK)
badge of honor (US), badge of honour (UK)

example.eg: The thieves passed through the security using forged identification badges.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 识别标识, 识别徽标

example.eg: On the first day of college we all wore lapel badges with our names on.
Ralph took his involvement in Boy Scouts very seriously; he earned more merit badges than any other boys in his troop.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （颁发给童子军以认可其成绩的）优秀奖章

example.eg: American policemen wear a police badge which bears a star.
